section.p: This class is used for rendering and corresponds to the Android native TextureView.
section.note: This class is only available for the Android platform.
section.p: To ensure the rendering of the image, before calling this component, you should proceed based on whether you are joining a channel:

ul.li: Not joining a channel: First call , and then call .
Joining a channel: First ensure capture is enabled, and then call .
